description.raw:
Every now and again I get bitten by leftover .pyc files and empty folders when updating
using mercurial.

Since updating via mercurial is more or less our official way of updating labscript suite programs, this ought to be a bit cleaner.

This PR has labscript_utils configure labscript suite repos to have a hook that deletes .pyc files and empty folders whenever hg update is run.

The configuration is checked and applied whenever labscript_utils is imported,
and runs when hg update is run.

This helps avoid trouble when leftover .pyc files from the wrong branch or
possibly even wrong Python version are importable even though their .py files
are gone.

The configuration is checked and applied whenever labscript_utils is imported, and runs when hg update is run.

This helps avoid trouble when leftover .pyc files from the wrong branch or possibly even wrong Python version are importable even though their .py files are gone.
